entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializer doesn't correctly deserialize readonly structs #94443
  • Test timeout in System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl.Tests on mono Amd64 OSX #94436
  • RE: System.NullReferenceException when using System.Speech 7.0.0-rc.1.22426.10 from Windows Forms #94435
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics] MetricsSubscriptionManager.Dispose not called #94434
  • [wasm] perf: AOT `CompileError: WebAssembly.Module(): Compiling function #116384:"System_Linq_Expressions_System_Linq_Expressions..." failed: not enough arguments on the stack for call (need 4, got 2) ` #94431
    9.0.0
  • GeneratedComClass codefix doesn't remove [ComVisible(true)] from classes #94429
    9.0.0
  • [ILLink analyzer] Analyzer doesn't produce RequiresDynamicCode warnings for dynamic objects #94427
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE_SM4 #94426
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE_SHA3 #94425
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE_BitPerm #94424
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE_AES #94423
  • [mono] Support AcceptByRefLike metadata generic param attribute #94421
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][post-MVP] garbage collection proposal in .NET #94420
    Future
  • ExceptionAsVoidMarshaller seems to not work at all #94419
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable support for IsByRefLike types in generics #94415
    9.0.0
  • Suggestion: Allow ReferenceResolvers to selectively assign reference IDs #94410
  • Enabling InvariantGlobalization breaks int.Parse in WASI apps #94407
  • [API Proposal]: Add custom error handling for BackgroundService #94403
  • Incorrect devirtualization in corner cases #94399
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_DeleteCategory #94395
  • Test failure System.Tests.AppDomainTests.AssemblyLoad #94394
  • Test failure _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashMainThreadAndWorkerThreads() #94393
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/CriticalHandles/ReverseTest/ReverseTest/ReverseTest.cmd #94392
  • Test failure System.Data.Tests.DataColumnCollectionTest2.Indexer2 #94391
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #94390
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Client Certificate Validation in .NET core is too restrictive #94152
  • Test failure readytorun/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest.sh #93163
    9.0.0
  • [JIT] Dead code might not be eliminated early enough #83620
    Future
  • Can't start a `Process` if `StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables` is called or evaluated on Windows systems #94338
  • ILLink analyzer analysis holes around dynamic objects #94057
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10049): The requested address is not valid in its context. #94430
  • Remove net6.0;net7.0 from System.Numerics.Tensors #93939
    9.0.0
  • Cannot use ConfigurationBinder source generator with a type that has a string ctor parameter with default value #93159
    9.0.0
  • JIT incorrectly adds handles to integer constants #94332
    8.0.x
  • Regressions from "Add a head merging transformation" #90929
    9.0.0
  • Signed division performed even when values are provably non-negative #94218
    9.0.0
  • Test failure ilasm\\System\\Runtime\\CompilerServices\\MethodImplOptionsTests\\MethodImplOptionsTests.cmd #93955
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a configurable overload of MemoryCacheEntryOptions for the commonly used method GetOrCreate in MemoryCacheExtension #92101
    9.0.0
  • Native AOT broken in Android-86x64 #94397
  • question: system text json warning on netcoreapp3.1 target framework #94327

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix HEAP* deprecation messages #94442
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Add printing full type name of nested types for ilverify output #94441
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Add document listing supported feature checks #94440
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add file handle limit setting for Alpine #94439
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94438
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94437
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Make Deflate/GZip/ZlibStream empty writes have the same impact as no writes #94433
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • React to new Package Validation change #94432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose ChannelReader.ReadAllAsync from non-core builds as well #94417
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix `EvalHWIntrinsicFunBinary` for ARM `MultiplyByScalar` #94413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option for R2R configured runs. #94412
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Remove dead GT_NOP code in LSRA #94409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94408
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Allow preinitializing RuntimeType instances #94405
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94402
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/7.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94401
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • [browser][MT] enable MT PLINQ #94214
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use BigMul for 32x32=64 in decimal #93345
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Avoid throwing when attempting to set IInternalModelingOnlyValue #94404
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Restore EETypeNode to the state before we deleted reflection blocking #94287
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try rooting less stuff for reflectable method signatures #92994
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable the Jitted Methods Counting Test When SSE2 is Disabled #94362
    test-bug, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clean up S.N.Tensors project in main #94378
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move dynamic object logic into dataflow analysis #94236
    area-Meta, linkable-framework
  • [RISC-V]Delete unused code in LowerConstIntDivOrMod #94328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [mono] Trying to fix performance regression. #94358
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix fgOptimizeAddition opt for AOT #94350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert DIV/MOD to UDIV/UMOD using assertions #94347
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents package readme #94371
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Add timeouts to AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingCallbackOde_KeepRunning #94398
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow RyuJIT to refer to frozen RuntimeType instances #94342
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • feat: add new IMemoryCache extensions #94335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve performance of BigInteger.Multiply(large, small) #92208
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] When local space overflows, retry compilation with optimization enabled #94381
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Unblock building with UseLocalAppHostPack #94340
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix passing message as paramName #94389
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • Replace `pushd/popd` Calls With `-S/-B` CMake Flags in the Build System #94353
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] fix stale memory on suspended thread #94299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve scalability of monitored Counter / UpDownCounter #91566
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Emit exception blocks for the new ILGenerator #94366
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. (#94267) #94307
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug, 8.0.x
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #94388
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #94372
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][amd64] Pass and return SIMD values in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Pass/receive SIMD arguments by value. #93794
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x

entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Hot Reload] `ENC0003: Updating 'attribute' requires restarting the application` caused by `AssemblyInformationalVersionAttribute` #36666
  • app do not start #36668

Closed

  • Make mistyping errors gentler #17005
    Backlog
  • dotnet restore crashes with internal CLR error #36417
  • Dotnet 7.0.201 broke build working in Dotnet 7.0.101 #30990

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove old System.CommandLine code that has a more natural expression #36672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler (#35939) #36670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add option to ignore baseline TFMs #36669
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [DO NOT MERGE PLEASE] Validate install-scripts changes #36661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • Change the format of tool exceptions and NuGet API exceptions to be graceful #36641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • update editorconfig template #36642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2308690 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #36657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable IDE0055 #70705
  • Diagnostic folder gives HTTP 404 error #70704
  • Follow-up changes for VS workspace LSP pull diagnostic requests #70703
    17.10

Closed

  • `IDE0054 Use compound assignment` can result in compiler error when dealing with user-defined operators #70651
  • Assertion in ConversionBase building customer solution #70659
    17.9
  • IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) is incorrectly suppressed if a nameof expression is used anywhere in the body. #70276
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Tweak spell checking spans #70706
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Insert release/dev17.9 to VS rel/d17.9 #70707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix `IDE0054` for increment/decrement when dealing with user-defined operators #70653
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add null literal to list of standard implicit conversions #70693
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not bail out of unused parameter analysis if encountered a `nameof` expression #70699
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove deprecated variable groups #70690
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove syntax serialization logic. #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref returning receivers in dynamic calls #70676
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, 17.9
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve Hover markdown on 'await' keyword #70629
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pascal and camel case should not allow underscores -- unless "_" is set as word_separator #70506
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improvements to auth and identity in ASP.NET Core 8 #51906
  • DynamicComponent Throws Run-Time Error on .NET 8 #51901
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #51899
  • Ability to transfer cascading values across render modes automatically #51896
    Backlog
  • AddExceptionHandler/UseExceptionHandler Fails in a non-Obvious Way #51888

Closed

  • Blazor multiple authentication schemes do not play nice with RenderModeServer #50122
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #51878
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #51884
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #51885
  • Perf improvement: json #51886
  • What is the recommended approach for javascript inside Blazor SSR projects? #51331
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Blazor Web App template with global WebAssembly interactivity doesn't compile #51862
  • [.NET 8 Blazor] HeadContent in .razor page should be APPENDED to, not replace any in the MainLayout #51864
  • Hosted Blazor WebAssembly project only runs with environment set to "Development" #51869
  • Blazor Web App template created app NOT set up for server-side rendering of Razor components by default. #51873
  • [.NET 8 Blazor] CascadingValue reset when navigating to client pages #51894
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formaction attribute #51734
    8.0.x
  • Blazor EditContext.OnFieldChanged notify wrong item when a list is filter or sorted #22355
    Planning: WebUI
  • HelixPlatform_QuickListenerIsSupported fails on win11.arm64 in Helix #47065
    Test failures
  • Hosting Blazor App behind an MVC app #26488
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 23556.1 #51907
    area-infrastructure
  • Update crypto-js version from 4.1.1 to 4.2.0 #51905
    area-blazor
  • Update crypto-js version from 4.1.1 to 4.2.0 #51904
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Update build docs and AspNetCore.sln #51900
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoid requiring ProblemDetailsService when IExeptionHandler is used #51898
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • [DO NOT MERGE PLEASE] Validate install-scripts changes #51889
    area-infrastructure
  • Un-quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads` #51887
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix "Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formaction attribute" #51895
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #51880
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump not working when process run as user #4375

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EmptyViewTemplate does not do anything #18551
  • ScrollView could (?) propagate touch events to children #18547
  • .NET 8 DynamicResource not working with gradients #18545
  • ScrollView layout breaks if child controls IsVisible starts as false #18542
  • SVG Image does not work on Button's ImageSource on Android #18537
  • Application as a ShareTarget works but it's opening an additional window with the splash image in Windows #18536
    Backlog
  • Editor Problems: (1) Events needed to catch when Android keyboard is manually closed by user are missing from Lifecycle, and (2) Editor starts up with flashing cursor (focused) #18535
  • Android toolbar navigation button tooltip gets stuck when rotated #18533
  • SwipeView In a CollectionView Faults When Scrolled in .NET 8 RC 2 #18530
    Backlog

Closed

  • Grid Overflow when content is too large #15342
  • The Image.Source data binding does not react to BindingContext changes #14157
  • TextColor of Label does not change with VisualStateManger inside CollectionView #8626
  • Android EmptyView in CollectionView weird resize after screen rotation #15158
  • MAUI When clicking blank and the keyboard is hidden, Entry does not have corresponding processing events And Xamarin can handle. #18125
    Backlog
  • Entry is not unfocus when hide or close softkeyboard #16897
  • [Android and iOS] Keyboard is not dismissed after entering text and tapping Search button in MAUI "SearchBar" control #14061
    Backlog
  • XamlCompilation attribute does not work (Windows 10 for sure, possibly Windows 11 too) for xaml files in Platform -> Windows. "IN RELEASE MODE" #14981
  • [Android][CollectionView]MAUI is too much slower than XAMARIN #18531
  • SecureStorage GetAsync not working in .NET 8 MAUI #17706
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException when resuming the App from an Android Autofill Service #18121
  • Clean install: still getting Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks, #15021
  • Downloaded file '<USER_HOME>\AppData\Local\Temp\xamarin-android-sdk\x86_64-33_r07.zip' fails checksum verification for Android SDK archive 'https://dl.google.com/android/repository/sys-img/google_apis_playstore/x86_64-33_r07.zip' #15383
  • Mac catalyst target cannot be removed from project Properties page #13884
  • Problem with template #17198
  • Cannot connect to mac after updating to VS 17.7.3 #17089
  • app terminates on startup #16594
  • Pair to Mac Too Slow #18174
  • 8.0.0-rc.2.9511 Button background does not override implicit visualstate style #18534
  • PickMultipleAsync returns after first pick on Android #18514
  • Unloded and Loaded events invoke multiple times at start #18403

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18553
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Frame`, `VisualElementRenderer` #18552
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Update car image/size #18550
    area/templates 📄
  • [X] allow x:Type extension for BPConverter #18540
    area/Xaml </>
  • Filter GetVisualTreeDescendants to not check elements with null handlers #18539
    .NET 8 SR1

Merged

  • [ci] Update net8 versions #18544
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add device test for PR #18356 #18387
  • Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks is stable #18549
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add new .NET 7 versions to the issue template #18546
  • [Android] Removes freeze using SecureStorage #17928
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • Improves performance of GetLayoutHandlerIndex #18499
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18472
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
    area/controls 🎮
  • Enable Dependabot #18511
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • fix 18457 #18458
    community ✨
  • [Tizen] Update TizenUIExtensionsVersion #18442
    community ✨
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • Add .NET Foundation license file header #16896
    area/architecture, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add unit tests to verify button's command is not messing up with manually set IsEnabled #18525
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, community ✨, control-button

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Logging of RelationalCommands stops for up to 1000ms once a command errors #32244
  • add document and Improve error messages of using "instead of insert trigger" #32243
  • Using JSON columns for TPH inheritance #32242
  • SQL SERVER varchar(max) 字符串长度在 4000到8000之间，字符串内容包含中文。EF CORE 保存报错: 数据类型 0xA7 的数据长度或元数据长度无效 #32238

Closed

  • Throw better exception if identity (0,1) is used #25077
    MQ
  • Exception thrown when using lazy loading with many to many relation defined from one side only and with SplitQuery behavior #32237
  • SQLite: add preliminary support for Virtual File Systems #32178

PullRequests

Created

  • Temporal table migrations refactor. #32239

Merged

  • Revert to latest public preview of the .NET SDK #32203
    auto-merge
  • Replace explicit richCodeNavigationEnvironment in azure-pipelines-richnav.yml #32082

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Merged

  • Don't use/look for 'cm.2.0' artifact names when building portable on Mariner #17699
  • Build portable runtime when PortableBuild is forced in SB/VMR #17698
  • Bump `darc` to fix VMR synchronization edge case #17693

Updated

  • Re-enable SB tests #17672
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Split current CI pipline #17370
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [source build] Use floating tags for container image names #17696
  • [release/6.0] Add alpine to CI for source-build #13074
